Home.presentation: I primarily work with Next.js and Golang, alongside Docker and PostgreSQL, building scalable, high-performance web applications. I have a strong interest in Software Architecture and continuously study advanced concepts such as MVC, layered architecture, Monoliths, and Microservices, including the migration of Monolithic systems to Microservices.

first_desc.text: This project leverages these technologies, which are central to my daily work. I apply them in both professional and personal projects, always focusing on best practices, scalability, and development quality.
These technologies also reflect my commitment to delivering modern, high-performance solutions that meet the real needs of each project.

second_desc.text: In addition to the technologies above, I have experience with other tools and frameworks. They are organized by category and can be explored in the skill cards.

roles.desc: Developed web applications using Go, React, PostgreSQL, and Docker. Designed and implemented REST APIs and system integrations. Delivered scalable, high-performance solutions while applying best practices in software architecture and DevOps.
Built web interfaces using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Created workflows and forms in TOTVS Fluig. Integrated REST APIs and automated internal processes to improve efficiency.
